description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 30 November 2021 (RN:21/03353/FULL) for the Alterations and extensions at 2, 3 and 4 Kingly Street and 3 Kingly Court comprised of the infill of the lightwell at basement, ground and first floor and part infill at second floor level between 2 Kingly Street and 3 Kingly Court. Erection of single storey mansard roof extensions to 2 Kingly Street and 3 Kingly Court, and rear extensions at third and fourth floor levels to 3 and 4 Kingly Street, installation of new plant at roof level above 2, 3 and 4 Kingly Street, and alterations to the fenestrations. Use of the upper floors of 2 Kingly Street as offices (Class E) and the ground/basement floors for either restaurant or retail purposes (Class E). The amalgamation of 3 and 4 Kingly Street at basement and ground floors for either retail (Class E), restaurant (Class E) or mixed-use restaurant/bar (sui generis). Creation of green roof areas and terraces at second, third, fourth and main roof level. Shopfront alterations to the front and rear of 2, 3 and 4 Kingly Street. (Land use swap with 37 Marshall Street and 2 Ganton Street). Namely, to change the proposed material from timber to aluminium window frames at levels 1-4 of 3 & 4 Kingly Street.
